alert.note: Alert for Allen; Henry; Putnam (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Putnam, southeastern Henry and northeastern Allen Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 425 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Weston to near Kalida. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ottawa, Bluffton, Columbus Grove, Leipsic, Deshler, Kalida, Pandora, Glandorf, Hamler, Dupont, West Leipsic, Gilboa, Cloverdale, Belmore, Miller City, Prentiss, Kieferville and Gallup. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 139 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
